text: Pala pali kusintha kwa mtunda pa zgaro za kutchimbira kufuma pa kota kufika pa hafu, cinthu cakuzirwa ni sipidi cara kweni kuzizipizga.
Wonani dankha mtundu wa maulendo agho kampani panji munthu uyo wakuvirapo ŵanthu, kwali mpha peji la pa intaneti panji pa windo la pashopu.
Unandi wa wanthu mu msumba wa Vatican mphafupifupi 800. Vatican ni caru cakuyima pacekha cicoko comene caru cose capasi kweniso ni caru ico cili na ŵanthu ŵachoko comene.

Mulimo wakucita vinthu mwakuyerezgera waka uwo ukacitika na Alfred Hershey na Martha Chase ukaŵa mulimo umoza uwo ukasacizga kuti mauthenga agho ghakusangika mu maselo (DNA) ni mphepete yimoza ya majini.
Cook Islands ni caru ca vilwa ico cili pa ubali na caru ca New Zealand ca ku Polynesia, pakati ca kumwera kwa nyaja ya Pacific.
Pala ukukhumba kumanya luso lakuponya ka boomerang kuti kawerereso ku woko lako, woneskeska kuti uli na ka boomerang kakwenerera kuti pala wakaponya, kakamanye kuwerera.
Kucita zgaro za skiing mwakuluta kucikhizga zikayamba mu vyaka vya mu ma 1800, ndipo mu chaka ca 1861, kilabu ya kucita zgaro izi yikajulika ku Australia na ŵanthu ŵa ku Norway.
Malo agha ngamoza mwa malo ghakulu ghakuchemelako ŵalendo mu South Africa ndiposo ni malo ghakuzirwa comene pa malo ghose ghakusamalirako vilengiwa ku South African.
Kanandi, nyimbo zikujambulika pakugwiriska nchito makompyuta ghapacanya comene pa kusazga masawundi ghakupambanapambana.
Mwachiyelezgero, munyake wangayowoya kuti para magalimoto ghapangika, mbwenu misewu nayo yizengekenge.

Ŵakagwiliska ntchito magalimoto ghakuyegha viswaswa kuti ghajande tunthowa twakunjilira mu makolovati kweniso ŵapolisi ŵakukwana 80 ŵakaŵapo kuti ŵawovwirenge awo ŵakwendeska magalimoto kuti ŵende misewu yinyake.
Dr. Tony Moll wakabowozga Chikhoso Chikuru Icho Chikukana Munkhwara (XDR-TB) ku chigaŵa cha KwaZulu-Natal ku South Africa.

General James Ewing wakatolanga ŵanthu ŵakurwa nkhondo awo mbasilikari cara ŵakukwana 700 nakumbuka nawo dambo pa Trenton Ferry, kupoka buliji la pa Assunpink Creek na kutondeska ŵasilikari ŵa murwani kuti ŵacimbire.
Lizgu lakuti 'safari' likung'anamura kutembeya na cakulata cakuwona vilengiwa vyakucitiska kaso vya ku Africa, comenemene mu mathengere gha mtundu wa savanna.
Sitima zakuyegha ŵanthu za MetroRail zilipo mitundu yiŵiri ku malo ghakufupi kweniso gha ku Cape Town: Yakwamba yikucemeka MetroPlus (yapacanya comene) na Metro (yakukwera waliyose waka).
Selo ni lizgu lakufumira ku ciyowoyero ca Cilatini ilo likung'anamula kacipinda kacoko.

Nthowa zakwendamo mauthenga gha m'thupi zikovwira kuti mukati mwa thupi, vinthu vilekenge kusintha pakutumizga mauthenga ku vigaŵa vyose vya thupi kuti ndopa zilutilire kwenda kwambula suzgo lilirose.
Mashekele ghakupangika pakusazgikana kwa visulo viŵiri panji kujumpha apo.Mungaluwanga cara kuti pali maelementi ghanandi pa periodic table.
Mu seŵero ili mukaŵanga ŵanthu awo ŵakusambilira waka kuchita maseŵero, ŵakufumira ku malo agha mpaka kuti East Texas.
Pakulongosorapo apo wakafumbikanga, iyo wakati nthenda yiphya iyi "njakusuzga chomene kweniso njakofya chifukwa yikukoma ŵanthu ŵanandi."
Ŵanthu 34 pa handiredi yiliyose awo ŵakapelekapo maghanoghano ghawo ŵakakolerana nayo, ŵakati ŵakukhumba kuti Fumukazi Elizabeth II yiŵe fumu yaumaliro ya charu cha Australia.
Zgaro za kukwera mapiri muhanya zikucitika pa mtunda wakuceperako mayilo yimoza kufika pa mtunda utaliko uwo ungafiskika pa zuŵa limoza.

Zgaro zakujitherereska pasi kufuma pa malo ghakukwera, nga ni skiing kweniso snowboarding, ngakumanyikwa comene ndipo munthu wakujitherereska pa cikhizga ico pazulana ciwuvi pakujikakilira vinthu kumalundi ghake.
Kuyana na vinthu ivi ivyo ŵali kufukura pasi, chikung'anamura kuti ntchipusu chomene thupi kugaŵikana kuluska umo maukaboni ghakukhwaskana na thupi ghakulongolera.
Pala mumwamutembeya ku Greenland nyengo ya kuzizima (pakuti pala ukuluta ku cha kumpoto, kuzizima nako kukukula), nkhwakukhumbika kunyamula vyakuvwala vyakuthukira.
Kuti munthu uyambe luso la kulemba vyakukhwaska kutembeya, cipusu comene nkhwamba na kulimbikiska luso lako pakulemba pa peji la pa intaneti lacikhazi.
Cenekoneko nchakuti, makodi gha cigaŵa cilicose ghakutimbanizgapo yayi pa ucitiro wa kubilana luso; CD yakukopera yikugwira nchito makola waka pa cipangizo ico CD yeneconeco yikugwira nchito.
Nthenda iyi yikuyegheka na nkhumba, ndipo pamanyuma yikwambukira ku ŵanthu para nyimbu zaŵaluwa.
Vikawonekanga nga ni vipinda.Iye wakaŵa munthu wakwamba kuwona maselo ghakufwa

Musumba wa Beijing ku China ndiko kucitikirenge cipharizgano ca Olympics cakucitika mu nyengo yakuzizima ca m'caka ca 2022, ndipo aka kaŵenge kakwamba kuti msumba umoza kucitikire cipharizgano ca Olympics ca m'nyengo yakuzizira na ca m'nyengo yakotcha.
Buliji la pa dambo la Oyapock ni buliji la cingwe ilo likucepeska mutunda wakufika ku musumba wa Oiapoque mu caru ca Brazil na musumba wa Saint- Georges de I'Oyapock mu caru ca French Guiana.
Ŵanthu ŵanandi ŵakusangilathu malo luŵiro pambere dazi la ulendo lindafike (pakuti nyengo zinandi ma boti yakuŵa yakuzula munyengo yavikondwelero).
Mahositelo kukukhala ŵacinyamata pera - ndipo mulendo ŵakuŵa na vyaka vya mu ma 20 - kweni nyengo zinyake mungasangaso munthu mulala ku malo agha.
Matempire ghanandi ghali na ciphikiro ca pa caka kwamba kuumaliro wa Novembala kufika mkatikati mwa mwezi wa Meyi, icho cikusintha kwakuyana na kalendala ya pa caka ya tempile lilirose.

Ŵasayansi ŵanji ŵakughanaghana kuti vinyama vikuru vyakofya vyakuŵa na masengwe ghatatu pa visko vyawo vikalyanga makuni yambura mithavi kweniso yakuŵa na mphumphu ya mahamba yakuthwa na kusongoka , agho ni mtundu wa makuni agho yakasangikanga chomene mu virimika vyakumasinda vyakufumira miliyoni kufikira miliyoni.

Pa nyengo ya 11:20, ŵapolisi ŵakapempha awo ŵakachitanga viwoneskero kuti ŵawelere mu kanthowa kachoko, ŵakati nangauli ŵanthu ŵakaŵa na wanangwa kuchita viwoneskero, kweni ŵakenerangaso kughanaghanira magalimoto ghanandi agho ghakatondekanga kujumpha.
Zgaro zinyake zakutherereka pa ciwuvi ghazam'citikira pa luwaza la zgaro la Taizicheng ku Zhangjiakou, pa mtunda wa makilomita 220 (mamayilo 140) kufuma ku musumba wa Beijing.
Waliyose uyo wakunozgekera kuluta ku caru cinyake uko kuli nkhondo, wakwenera kupokera visambizgo vyapadera.

Chombo chakuzingilira mwezi icho mukaŵavya ŵanthu chakuchemeka Chandrayaan-1 chikanjizga pa mwezi makina ghake ghakujambulira pa mwezi ghakuchemeka Moon Impact Probe (MIP), agho ghakafika pa mwezi pa sipidi ya makilomita 1.5 pa sekondi (mamayilosi 3000 pa ora), ndipo ghakafika mwakuchita kuwa kufupi na chigaŵa chakumwera cha Mwezi.
Kweniso, ku malo kwakuthukira, mabakiteliya ghakukula luŵiro kweniso ghakukhala nyengo zitali kuwalo kwa thupi.

Mwa apo na apo, ndege za ŵanthu awo ŵakughamanya makora malo agha zikuyegha ŵalendo na kuluta nawo pakatikati pa malo agha kuti ŵakakwere mapiri panji kufika pachanya chomene, apo pali malo ghasani chomene.
Ndele izi zikufumiska poyizoni uwo ungananga misipa ya ŵanthu na vinyama wuwo.
Ma ufumu agha yakaŵa yamoza mwa nyengo iyo ŵanthu ŵakafwa chomene mu mbiri ya China wakale vikwi vya ŵanthu vikafwa apo ŵakarwanga kuti ŵakhale pa chizumbi mu nyumba ya chifumu ku Xi'an.
Pala munthu waluta ku mtunda pa ulendo wa pa sitima, ukukhumbaso viza yayi (kwambira mu caka ca 2009).
Ivyo ŵali kusanga vikovwiraso kupulikiska umo mahungwa gha viyuni ghali kusinthira kufuma nyengo yakale kufika sono.
Dr. Moll wakughanaghana kuti ŵalwari ŵanyake ŵakwenera kuti ŵakatora kachibungu ka nthenda iyi mu chipatala, ndipo ŵaŵiri mwa ŵalwari aŵa mbakugwira ntchito za chipatala.

Apo ukalutila kuwalo kakwamba, ŵanthu ŵamucaro ico nyengo zinyakhe ŵakaŵa ŵakuzizipizga na kupulikiska, pakumanya kuti ŵanthu ŵanandi awo mbalendo ŵakutola nyengo kuti ŵazgoŵele ukhaliro wa m’caru ciphya.
Msecho wa pa malo gha civikiliro ulikuyamba kuwona vyachisisi vinandi vyakukhwaska munthu kufumira pa 11 September, 2001 apo vigawenga vikacitira nkhaza caru ca USA.
Pasono, ŵanthu ŵakulemba mauthenga pa kompyuta ndipo ŵali kuleka kukolaso cakuŵajira maphensulu.
Ŵakusandasanda ŵakusachizga kuti, nangauli uwu ni muchira wa ka dinosauri kamwana, kweni ivyo ŵakasanga vikulongora mahungwa gha dinosauri yilara, twa yana yichoko yayi.
Kukura kwa pH kukulongora unandi wa nkhongono ya Hydrogen (H uyo wali ku pH) mu munkhwara uwo mukuyezga .
Mwasoka, para wapanga DVD, muphepete mwake namo mukudumulika, ndipo usange ivyo vikuyowoyeka mu DVD iyo vikulembeka musi chomene, navyo vikudumulika.
Pakaŵavya malipoti ghakulongora kuti magalimoto ghakazurana mu msewu wakuzingilira msumba, uwo ni msewu unyake wakufumira mu msumba.
Pakati pa ŵachona aŵa pali ŵachona ŵapakatikati awo ŵakurya nyama zikuruko nga ni kalulu, mbaŵala na mphoyo.

Nthenda ya viyuni yakuchemeka H5N1, iyo njakofya chomene ku ŵanthu, ŵali kusanda na kusimikizga kuti yikakora baka wamuthondo uyo wali kufwa, uyo wakasangika pa Mande mu chithapwi cha kufupi na Lyon chakumafumiro gha dazi kwa France.

Vyakumagilira mathabwa ghaŵiri agha kuti ghaleke kutayana vikabowozgeka na kwamba kupangika ni kale. Nangauli, pachokopachoko, kukasangika kuti nthowa izi zingaŵa makola chomene pala zingawa za chisulo m'malo mwa vikuni panji mathabwa.
Cimanyikwiro cikulu comene ca poizoni wa mkati mwa thupi ni kusangika kwa kabotolo ka mankhwala ako nkhakujula.
Uwu ni mwaŵi wakuwonerako ungweru wakwamba wa zuŵa la kumwera kwa caru capasi, cifukwa kukuŵa cidima nyengo zose.
Charu cha Turkey ni charu icho chili pa nambala 37 kuŵa charu chikuru chomene pa charu cha pasi.

Sipika Wakale wa Mphara ya Malango Newt Gingrich wakaŵa pa malo ghachinayi, gavanara wa ku Texas Rick Perry wakaŵa pa malo ghachinkhondi, ndipo Mwanakazi uyo ni Mupangi Marango Michele Bachmann wakaŵa pa malo gha chinkhondi na chimoza.

Gulu la vilwa ivi likusangika pa mtunda wa makilomita 120, kumpoto kwa malo agho nthaka cikunjira mumaji. Cilwa cikulu comene cikucemeka King George ndipo kuli malo ghakukhala ghakucemeka Villa Las Estrellas.
Purezidenti wa charu cha U.S. George W. Bush wakachipokelera chipharazgo ichi.
Paliso vinyakhe ivyo ŵalendo ŵakucita ku Disney kweni ivi vyazunulika apa ndivyo vikung'anamula nadi ulendo wakuluta ku Disney.

Maulato ghakulu gha Italy ghakaŵa pa vyaru vya mu Africa. Kuti ŵatore vyaru ivyo, ŵakenera kuŵa na malo agho ŵasilikari ŵangaponyeka mu mlengalenga pakwenda pa vinthu ivyo vikwenda mu mlengalenga nga ni ndege, ntherura kuti ŵasilikari ŵamanye kuworoka nyanja ya Mediterranean na kuya karwa Africa.
Timu yapacanya ya South Africa yikayamba makora comene pakuhozga vigoli 26 apo timu ya Zambia iyo yikaŵa pa nambala 5 yikahozgapo na cigoli na cimoza wuwo yayi.
Ŵakakwera galimoto yakuguzika na hachi , ŵakazingiririka na guru la ŵanthu ŵakukwiya apo ŵakawereranga ku Paris ndipo ŵanthu aŵa ŵakachemerezganga na kupoma mphomo zakofya Karonga na Fumukazi.
Uyo wakawina medulo ya siliva pa maseŵera gha Olympics mu 2004 Amir Khan wakati, "Pasi pa mtima nkhuwona kuti nkhonya ya ŵanakazi yikwenera kuŵapo. Agha ni maghanoghano ghane."
Ku Beijing ndiko kucitikirenge mwambo wakujulira kweniso mwambo wakujalira cipharizgano ici, kweniso zgaro zakucitikira mukati mwa vinyumba.
Ghanoghano ili likususkana na fundo yakuti ku mwezi kungachitika yayi vinthu vyakuti visinthe umo kuliri.
Pali masayizi na kaŵiro kakupambanapambana ka maso kwakuyana na vyakukhumba vya chinyama ico cigwiriskenge nchito maso agho.
Kwizira mu phangano la Schengen zone, vyaru vyose ivi vikuŵa waka nga ni caru cimoza pera muvakuchitika vawo.
Mu vyaka vyose vya m'ma 1960, Brzezinski wakagwiranga ntchito kwa John F. Kennedy nga ni munthu wakumupa ulongozgi kweniso mu muwuso wa Lyndon B. Johnson.
Mu 1957 Luxembourg wakaŵa membala uyo wakambiska bungwe ilo sono likumanyikwa kuti European Union.
Nkhani iyo yili mu sumu ya mtundu wa opera ku France, ya Camille Saint-Saens, nja munthu "uyo wakutemwa chomene charu cha Japan na munkhwara wakutimbanizga wongo."
Wati watondeka nkhondo yakwamba, Etherlred wakazomera kuchita phangano la mtende na Olaf, uyo wakaweleraso ku Norway kuti wakayezge kutoraso ufumu wake mwakusuzgikira.
Pamanyuma, ŵakamusinthira ku chipatala cha Addenbrooke's Hospital ku Cambridge.
Malo gha mapiri ghakupokera ŵalendo ŵanandi mu nyengo yakuthukira ku India.
Vilwa vinyake ni Livington na Deception uko ŵanthu ŵangaluta kukadaŵira pa cidikha apo pakufuma vibala vyakotcha kufuma pa nthaka.

Mu chipharizgano chake chinyake, chakuchemeka Giant Slalom, wakaŵa pa nambala 10 mu gulu la ŵanakazi ŵakuskeneneka pa chiwuvi chakukhala pasi ndipo para maminiti ghose agho wakachimbira ghasazgika pamoza ghakukwana 4:41.30, wakachedwa na maminiti 2:11.60 kwa uyo wakaŵa pa malo ghakwamba Claudia Loesch waku Austria ndipo wakachedwa na maminiti 1:09.02 kwa uyo wakaŵa pa malo ghachinkhondi na chinayi Gyöngyi Dani wa ku Hungary.
Murray wakaluza chigaŵa chakwamba, wakasankhika yayi apo ŵanalume ŵaŵiri aŵa ŵakatondana mu chigaŵa ichi.
Cinthu cimoza chakunozga comene kwa ŵana muchigaŵa ntchilongolero ca mazgu na kuŵala kwa pa vimapilala vakuchemeka ma pyramid.
Pala ukuwelera mucharu cako, ni viŵi yayi kukufumba vinandi pa cipata cakunjilira mucaru kweni pala wayegha katundu, ŵamisonkho ŵakulekapo waka cara.
Pala uli pa holide yakukhala kunyumba panji kufupi na kunyumba, muli na nyengo yinandi yakujisanguluska na kujinozgera kacakumwa ako mwakhumba.
Maatomu ghanyake ghali na manyukiliyasi ghakwendendeka ico cikung'anamula kuti ghakuphulikanga khwambula kugunyuzgika comene panji pala ghagunyuzgika pacoko waka.

Pa Sabata usiku, Purezidenti wa charu cha United States Donald Trump, mu uthenga uwo ukapelekeka kwizira mwa muyowoyeri wa boma, wakapharazga kuti ŵasilikari ŵa charu cha US ŵafumengeko ku charu cha Syria.
Setilayiti iyo yili kuchanya yikupokelera ivyo mukuyowoya pa foni na kuvitumizgaso pasi nyengo yeneyiyo.
Munyakheso wakumanyikwa chomene wa chiGriki ni nkhwantha ya masamu Pythagoras, wakumanyikwa chomene na maghanoghano ghake yakukhwaskana na kukolerana kwa malwande ya trayango ayo ghakuwa na kona la.
Ŵanthu ŵanyake ŵakaghanaghana kuti wakuneneska kweni ŵanandi ŵakagomezganga kuti zuŵa pamoza na nyenyezi ndivyo vikuzwetelera caru capasi.
Makasino ghakuyezgeska kuti ŵanthu ŵataye nyengo yitali kweniso ndalama zinandi pala ŵafikamo.
Mu milonga ya mu virwa ndiposo mu Nyanja, munthu wakukhumbikwira kuŵa na maboti pera yayi.
Mu nyengo ya cihanya, munthu ukwenera kucenjera na uzuzu pala mucitenge zgalo zakuyenda mu nkhorongo za makuni ghanandi.
Filimu iyi, iyo muli Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone, yikasankhika kuti yachita makora mu vigaŵa vyose vikuruvikuru.
Munthu ukwenera kutola hafu la ola kuti umale kwenda kuzungulira muzi wakusanguluska uwu.
Nyenyezi zikufumiska ungweru na chithukivu chifukwa cha nkhongono iyo yikupangika para vinthu ivyo vikuŵa mu hydrogen vyasazgika (panji kubanyana) pamoza na kupanga vinthu vizito.
Mu 1995 wakasoleka kuŵa wakusoŵera bola muweme chomene mu mbiri ya Partizan.
Kudumulizga tulo nkhuchitira dala vinthu vyakupangiska kuti wamunthu uwuke panyengo iyo ukugonera na kugonaso tulo para pajumpha nyengo yichoko waka (maminiti 10 mpaka 60).
Madazi ghano makompyuta yakugwirisika ntchito kusintha kawonekelo kavithuzi namavidiyo.
Malo gha mtundu wene wuwu ghakucemeka "hei" ku Rogaland na ku Agder, kung'anamura malo ghambura makuni gha dongo la ndere pacanya.

Kufumba maghanoghano gha ŵanthu kukati kwafika pa chinyina, ŵanthu 29 pa handiredi yiyose awo ŵakafumbika ŵakugomezga kuti charu cha Australia chikwenera kwamba kuwusika na purezidenti mwaluŵiro, apo ŵanthu 31 pa handiredi ŵakugomezga kuti charu cha Australia chikwenera yayi kuŵa na purezidenti.
